amendatorysection.catchline: Board of trustees; officials and assistants; appoint; compensation.
amendatorysection.para: The board of trustees of such facility or facilities as provided by section 23-3501 shall have power to appoint, remove, and fix the compensation of a suitable administrator, superintendent or matron, or two or more of such officials, and necessary assistants and in general carry out the spirit and intent of sections 23-3501 to 23-3509 in establishing and maintaining such facility or facilities.
